body: Abena mourns the passing of the iconic Mozambican artist Malangatana: "Sadly, many Africans may be scratching their heads wondering who exactly Malangatana was. However, for those who had the humbling honour of coming up close and personal with his work, it is indeed a tragic loss."
original_body: Abena mourns the passing of the iconic Mozambican artist Malangatana: "Sadly, many Africans may be scratching their heads wondering who exactly Malangatana was. However, for those who had the humbling honour of coming up close and personal with his work, it is indeed a tragic loss."
title: Mozambique: Death of an Iconic African Artist, Malangatana
